title: Tabs unpredictably closing when first starting firefox and opening a website
content:
When i first start firefox idk what really causes it and can't really reproduce the issue and it's random on all pc's/os's i try by one thing in common is that it happens when i use my synced firefox account

So when it starts and i open a website it "sometimes" just closes immediately and have to reopen that website Also happens from a saved session. It's the wierdest issue i have ever seen as it's random and there isn't a way to really reproduce it to as far as i know.

I am sure it's some setting that is synced with my account as i didn't have the problem before i have had this issue for a few years now i think and it's really annoying and have looked if there was anything similar to this issue and couldn't find anything.
creator: pieter23

title: FF dev tools; finding code by selecting element not element by selecting code
content:
Using built-in FF developer tools, I wish to select page elements on the screen render and have that highlight the associated html in the inspector.

Drilling down through inspector code while watching highlightsis is slow, and difficult with reduced window area and buried divs that require clicks to expand. I haven't found any other way.

I'm sure this must be possible but I'm not getting it. Of course I have a lot to learn, but is there a place that specifically explains the dev tools or presents them in the form of a lesson? My inability to figure out this highlight thing has been humbling, and searching specific questions has proven a dead end that just leads me back to this community site.
creator: skyhook1
